notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: M.B.K. and J.C. designed the studies. J.C. performed experiments. D.Z., X.Q., K.O. analyzed TCGA data. J.C. and J.J.M. compiled the manuscript. J.C., D.Z., X.Q., K.O., J.J.M., M.B.K. edited manuscript. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
